dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The dollar actually dropped below 515 tenge during trading on May 6, according to KASE.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The dollar actually dropped below five hundred fifteen tenge during trading on May six, according to K A S E.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The dollar dropped below 515 tenge during trading on May 6, according to data from the Kazakhstan Stock Exchange (KASE).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the weighted average exchange rate closed at, um, 514.50 tenge per dollar—that's down by more than three and a half tenge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the weighted average exchange rate closed at, um, five hundred fourteen point five zero tenge per dollar-that's down by more than three and a half tenge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The weighted average exchange rate at the end of daytime trading was 514.50 tenge per dollar, down by 3.60 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And yet the National Bank's official exchange rate for that day was still set higher, right? At 518.53 tenge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And yet the National Bank's official exchange rate for that day was still set higher, right? At five hundred eighteen point five three tenge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The official exchange rate set by the National Bank for May 6 stands at 518.53 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. So there's a bit of a gap there. In Almaty exchange offices, the buying rate was around 515, selling at like 517.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. So there's a bit of a gap there. In Almaty exchange offices, the buying rate was around five hundred fifteen, selling at like five hundred seventeen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to kurs.kz, the average buying rate in Almaty exchange offices is 515.39 tenge, while the selling rate is 517.35 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But in Astana, it was even lower for buying—just 512.56 tenge per dollar. That's interesting, the regional differences.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But in Astana, it was even lower for buying-just five hundred twelve point five six tenge per dollar. That's interesting, the regional differences.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Astana, dollars are being bought at an average of 512.56 tenge and sold at 518.56 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. Economists are saying this strengthening of the tenge isn't just a blip; it might have some legs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. Economists are saying this strengthening of the tenge isn't just a blip; it might have some legs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Do we know what's driving it? I mean, dropping below 500 even at some points—that's huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Do we know what's driving it? I mean, dropping below five hundred even at some points-that's huge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Some experts think it's tied to commodity prices or maybe central bank interventions. The forecasts have been all over the place lately.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Some experts think it's tied to commodity prices or maybe central bank interventions. The forecasts have been all over the place lately.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. I remember earlier predictions were way more conservative, nobody saw it dipping this low so quickly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. I remember earlier predictions were way more conservative, nobody saw it dipping this low so quickly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It makes you wonder if this is gonna hold or if we're in for more volatility.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It makes you wonder if this is gonna hold or if we're in for more volatility.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And with those regional disparities between Almaty and Astana, it adds another layer.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And with those regional disparities between Almaty and Astana, it adds another layer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, people exchanging money might wanna shop around a bit, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, people exchanging money might wanna shop around a bit, honestly.
